page.title: 13MOORLANDS JUNIOR SCHOOL,BATH
page.content: The work we do at school is history,science,English,maths,art and lots of other things.We do lots of sports and games that often take place on our playing field next to the school.We go on trips, school journeys,and we go to museums. Apart from being in the classroom and going on trips we have an assembly every morning at 10.15 a.m. until play time at 10.40 a.m. At 11.a.m we come in and work for an hour and then go to the dining room for lunch.The dinner hour is long enough for us to eat our lunch and have a game of football before school re-starts.The bell is rung for the end of lunch hour and we all go back to the classroom and normally do some art and craft,and topic work.
